title: Sex or Sourdough? Oprah Owes You An Apology 5.1.20
itunes:title: Sex or Sourdough? Oprah Owes You An Apology 5.1.20
description:
In episode 621, Jack and Miles are joined by There Are No Girls On The Internet podcast host Bridget Todd to discuss some coronavirus facts to take into consideration before we re-open, how cover-19 effects people of color, Trump not happy with his polling against Biden, condom sales down, which movie they will watch for TDZ movie club, covid documentaries, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Oprah Winfrey Rolls Out A Wagon Of Fat
  2. 3 Coronavirus Facts Americans Must Know Before Returning To Work, School
  3. If COVID-19 Doesn’t Discriminate, Then Why Are Black People Dying at Higher Rates?
  4. Trump presented with grim internal polling showing him losing to Biden
  5. Condom sales down as lockdown limits sex lives, says Durex maker
  6. There Are Too Many Covid-19 Documentaries in the Works
  7. WATCH: Mia Doi Todd - My Room Is White (Flying Lotus Remix)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
